divs: sighting detailsdate; 12\09\2010 time; 2205 hrs. ufo sighting duration; 40 min. place; canton, ga. details; i went outside to the back deck to put out the tiki lights, when i looked towards the west, i noticed a strange pulsating light in the western sky about 12 miles away. i could just make out some color flickering about the white light. i waited a few minutes and it didn���t seem to move, i then noticed a high flyer ( commercial jet) between my view and the object, the jet was a little higher. i proceeded to go in the house to retrieve my binoculars and told my wife and daughter what i was seeing. they went to get the cameras, and began to take pictures to document what we were looking at. there was a bright white light with color lights(red, blue, green, orange) flickering all around it, as well as a smaller red orb a little smaller then the white light, it was positioned about 5���oclock from the main light and moved clock wise to counter clock wise this was done several times then it blinked out. the object at arms length would be about 3 mm in diameter. distance about 12 miles, angle 35* degrees, alt. 15+k, compass dir. 255* w. my daughter took some video, there are several jets flying by this stationary object, the video is from a small digital camera. several more jets flew past this object, above, below and between us and the object. if i was to guess the size, i would say the same as a 737. we continued to watch for about 40 minutes then it seemed to move down over the tree line. we are hoping for a repeat tonight, we will be ready. the attach photo is a day time picture of the night time obsivation position.
